comments.body: Based on upstream, should probably have an unconditional dependency on `importlib_metadata`.

According to setup.cfg, it's only for python<=3.8. I tested locally and just committed. Waiting for tests. 
PS: can't use a selector  otherwise it becomes not no-arch (I now get why unconditional was necessary), but seems importlib_metadata is present in all python versions, so no problem.
https://github.com/nschloe/meshzoo/blob/v0.7.3/setup.cfg#L34
https://setuptools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/userguide/dependency_management.html#declaring-dependencies
